title: When I Found You Sleeping

song_root.core_event: Finding someone I loved after they chose to leave - the moment time stopped
song_root.core_resistance: Fear of letting time move forward, letting the moment end, accepting they're gone
song_root.core_longing: To stay in that Sunday morning forever, to feel the weight of love before the loss
song_root.core_transformation: From stuck in the loop to accepting the freeze, landing in 2024 with scars

song_intent.imagery_texture: Warm morning light frozen in time, sheets that remember, clocks that stopped

technical_constraints.rule_breaking_justification: The progression moves from expected Dm (vi) to Bb (IV) in the chorus - this breaks the verse loop and creates emotional weight. The major IV chord in this context feels bittersweet, making hope feel earned rather than easy.

notes: Verses use F-C-Am-Dm (the stuck, the cycle). Chorus uses F-C-Am-Bb (the drop, the reveal). Arpeggiated fingerpicking, ~120 BPM (or 82 BPM MIDI). Lo-fi aesthetic with imperfections valued.
